meta.title: Importance Labeling
meta.description: Highlight the important parts of an image
meta.disclaimer: This is a disclaimer. You are participating in this experiment voluntarily.

instructions.simple: Your task is to draw the most important regions (either graphics or text blocks) for a set of images. However, you DO NOT need to be very precise. We are only looking for a rough indication of the most important regions. You also don't need to mark every region, just those which appear important.
steps: An image will be shown. Analyze it and identify the most important parts.
Label those parts with one of the given tools: stroke or polygons.
Once you are done, click Next to go to the next image.
